snippet: APOSTLE--Mary N. (nee Katsaros) 103 years old. Peacefully on June 5, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Nicholas (Founder of Riverdale Funeral Home.) Loving mother of Basil N. and Maria, Gregory N. and Maria, Athena J. and the late Christos and James. Cherished grandmother of seven, great-grandmother of eleven. The family will be present to receive friends on Thursday from 3-8pm at The Riverdale Funeral Home, 5044 Broadway, at the corner of 214th Street, NYC and on Friday from 10 to 11am at Holy Trinity G.O. Church, 10 Mill Road, New Rochelle, NY. With the Funeral Service to follow at 11:00am. Interment, Mt. Hope Cemetery Hastings on Hudson, NY. Donations to Holy Trinity G.O. Church, 10 Mill Rd., New Rochelle, NY 10801. 1/3
